title: TPACK-Based Language Teacher Competency Enhancement Course in Blended and Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency, language teaching experience, and foundational understanding of grammar and vocabulary instruction
context.additional_context: Microlearning content optimized for smartphone-based environments. Emphasizes real-time feedback through formative assessments. Focuses on activity design to improve learners' reading comprehension and expressive skills

learning_goals: Explain the seven knowledge domains of the TPACK framework and apply them to language education contexts.
Apply at least three digital tools for language education (e.g., vocabulary learning apps, writing feedback tools, pronunciation analysis software) in blended learning environments to actual classes.
Design two types of interactive language learning activities producible via mobile devices (e.g., real-time collaborative writing, voice-based role-play) and submit them for peer evaluation.

resources: AR/VR Content Samples for Language Education
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
